description: 1000+ scientific tools for AI scientists: life science, reserach, literature, and more.
name: io.github.mims-harvard/tooluniverse

environmentVariables.description: OpenAI API key for LLM-based tool finding and embedding features
environmentVariables.name: OPENAI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Anthropic API key for Claude-based features
environmentVariables.name: ANTHROPIC_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Google Gemini API key for Gemini-based features
environmentVariables.name: GEMINI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: OpenRouter API key for accessing 100+ LLM models
environmentVariables.name: OPENROUTER_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Azure OpenAI API key (alternative to OpenAI)
environmentVariables.name: AZURE_OPENAI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: HuggingFace token for accessing models and datasets
environmentVariables.name: HF_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: NCBI/PubMed API key for higher rate limits (10 req/sec vs 3 req/sec). Register at https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/account/
environmentVariables.name: NCBI_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: Semantic Scholar API key for higher rate limits (100 req/sec vs 1 req/sec). Register at https://www.semanticscholar.org/product/api
environmentVariables.name: SEMANTIC_SCHOLAR_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: BioGRID API key for protein-protein interaction queries. Register free at https://webservice.thebiogrid.org/
environmentVariables.name: BIOGRID_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: DisGeNET API key for gene-disease association data. Register free at https://www.disgenet.org/
environmentVariables.name: DISGENET_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: OMIM API key for Mendelian disease data. Register at https://omim.org/api
environmentVariables.name: OMIM_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: OncoKB API token for precision oncology annotations. Register at https://www.oncokb.org/apiAccess
environmentVariables.name: ONCOKB_API_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: NVIDIA NIM API key for AlphaFold2 structure prediction, molecular docking, and genomics tools. Get key at https://build.nvidia.com
environmentVariables.name: NVIDIA_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: USPTO API key for patent data access. Register at https://developer.uspto.gov/
environmentVariables.name: USPTO_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: UMLS API key for medical terminology and concept mapping. Register at https://uts.nlm.nih.gov/uts/
environmentVariables.name: UMLS_API_KEY

environmentVariables.description: BRENDA enzyme database login email. Register at https://www.brenda-enzymes.org/
environmentVariables.name: BRENDA_EMAIL

packageArguments.description: Compact mode enabled by default: only exposes 4 core tools (tool finder, tool executor, etc.) to prevent context window overflow. All 1000+ tools remain accessible via the execute_tool function.
Specific tool categories to load (e.g., uniprot ChEMBL opentarget pubmed). Omit to load all tools. See full list: https://zitniklab.hms.harvard.edu/ToolUniverse/tools/tools_config_index.html
packageArguments.name: --categories
